{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3468627,"name":"JohnGilb","username":"JohnGilb","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/j/6bbea6/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-04T16:39:43.296Z","cooked":"

Another year, another release!

As in previous years, most of our repositories are at Team488 XBOT · GitHub, most notably,
GitHub - Team488/XBot2024, Our main “core code” for the robot.

Our vision is released in a separate offline package, Xbot 2024 Vision Release.

The first link also includes all our code from previous seasons! Good luck to all!
